codeReview.summary: The migration guide is comprehensive and cross-referenced to real v0.6 APIs, but it does not satisfy a key acceptance criterion: each required entry must include both before/after code and migration steps.

issues.description: Section 6 (Output Truncation and Pagination Hints) includes migration steps but no before/after code pair. The feature requirement states each of the 8 entries must include before/after code and migration steps.
Section 7 (File Pointers for Large Output) includes migration steps but no before/after code pair, violating the same per-entry requirement.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The docs-worker skill procedure requires lint + typecheck + test, but this run recorded only lint while still reporting followedProcedure=true.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: .factory/skills/docs-worker/SKILL.md:64-71 requires bun run lint, bun run typecheck, and bun run test; handoff file /Users/mg/.factory/missions/ae41b573-bba1-46f1-8355-b618b7b79237/handoffs/2026-02-28T17-07-55-945Z__migration-v06-docs__2f362eb7-602c-49b0-9730-5e5ef4bbf011.json:16 records only bun run lint under verification.commandsRun.

sharedStateObservations.observation: Mission shared guidance has an outdated NDJSON progress example that includes a 'name' field not present in the actual StreamProgressEvent contract.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: /Users/mg/.factory/missions/ae41b573-bba1-46f1-8355-b618b7b79237/AGENTS.md:75 shows progress event with "name"; packages/contracts/src/stream.ts:78-89 defines StreamProgressEvent with only type/current/total/message.

summary: Reviewed worker session 2f362eb7-602c-49b0-9730-5e5ef4bbf011 and commit c23297fb. Feature fails acceptance due to missing before/after code pairs in required entries 6 and 7; all other required topic areas are present.
